attributes.action: All Remain parties to unify against the Brexit party for European elections.
attributes.additional_details:
If people vote for individual parties for the European elections we won’t beat the Brexit party. 

People must decide on ONE remain/second referendum party to support or the parties must unite into ONE remain organisation to combat the Brexit Party

This gives voters a simple option Remain/Leave.

7 million signed the petition to revoke article 50 and have a second referendum. This is the next to make that happen
attributes.background:
If people vote for individual parties for the European elections we won’t beat the Brexit party. 

The the parties must unite into ONE REMAIN organisation to combat the Brexit Party
